title: Ticket #5010: Global Job Prios fails if priority is a float
description:
In schedd.cpp, we have: 

                        if ( job->LookupInteger(ATTR_JOB_PRIO,job_prio) ) {
                                scheduler.Owners[OwnerNum].PrioSet.insert( job_prio );
                        }

If the JobPrio attribute is a float, then the lookup fails. If all job prios are floats, then the schedd appears to drop out of the matchmaking.
creator: bbockelm
